fullText: Sean Hayes delivers a tour-de-force performance as Oscar Levant in this biographical play that captures both the wit and tragedy of the pianist-comedian's life.
dtliExcerpt: Sean Hayes delivers a tour-de-force performance as Oscar Levant in this biographical play that captures both the wit and tragedy of the pianist-comedian's life.
